title: German potato salad
ingredients: ['500g new baby potatoes, halved (skin on, but optional)', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 medium tart sweet apple, peeled and chopped', '10 cornichons, chopped', '1 tablespoon low fat mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon low fat yoghurt', '1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard or German mustard', '1/2 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
